alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jones, central Craven, south central Beaufort and west central Pamlico Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cayton to 7 miles east of Phillips Crossroads. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Vanceboro, Askins, Cayton, Jasper, Tuscarora, Rhems, Olympia, Grantsboro, Royal, Croatan, Riverdale, Ernul, Fairfield Harbour, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport, Alliance and Aurora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven
